did.unittitle: Flashback/Flashward: Architecture and Urbanishm 1960-2000 symposium transcript in 5 volumes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Speakers and presenters include David Mohney, Sandy Isenstadt, Wallis Miller, Herb Greene, Richard Levine, Deborah Fausch, Raymond Gastil, Grady Clay, Camilo Jose Vergara, Yona Friedman, John Dutton, Stan Allen, Joan Ockman, Patricia Morton, Peter Blake, Alan Colquhoun, Robert Slutzky, Annie Chu, Sheila Kennedy, Charles Graves, Athony Eardley, Jose Oubrerie, Clyde Carpenter, and Jim Gray.
